answerText: Ignatius J. Reilly [or Ignatius J. Reilly][10]  Ignatius J. Reilly is the protagonist of A Confederacy of Dunces, a novel by this author whose work was heavily influenced by his hometown of New Orleans.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 18 | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character's recommended reading list includes Boethius and Batman, with little else in between. For 10 points each: [10]  Name this character who sells hot dogs for Paradise Vendors and writes diatribes against modern society in his Big Chief notepads.
